attributes.additional_details: This man is a true inspiration, a true friend to Rob Burrows. His determination in what he has achieved and accomplished for the MND Charity. He would be a well deserved recipient of this honour. He never gave up on Rob and if Rob was here he would agree with the above. He is an ordinary man that just wanted to do something for his dear friend. If you asked Kevin he would probably decline the award and that I did not do it to get an award he purely done it to help his FRIEND Rob. A legend !
attributes.background: I would like this man knighted

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
